info.+content: Sebastien lives with his grandfather and aunt in a Spanish on the Pyrenees. After befriending a white Pyrenean Mountain Dog he names Belle, Sebastian sets out on a journey across the Pyrenees to France to find his Roma mother whom he knows is still alive.
